Name: Battle Royale Tycoon
About the game: Design and build arenas for your guests to fight in, keep them happy, your workers paid and make a profit! Design and build your own arenas for your guests to fight. Set up the Arena rules and Game Mode: Battle Royale, Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag. Listen to your guests and improve the design of your arenas: Add guns, cover, fix spawn kills. Build up the rest of your park with Shops, Bathrooms, Shooting Ranges, etc. Repair your items and keep them in good condition so no one gets hurt. Clean up the arenas before starting a new battle. Keep your Guests happy, your Workers busy and make a profit!
